channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 07:23 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 07:23 Driven anxiety in the Chernihiv region.Creck on further messages.#Chernihiv This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 07:15 Driven anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.

item.title: 游리 07:06 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 07:06 Flashing anxiety in Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Mirorsk Territorial Community- Chervonohrigor Territorial Community#of Dnipropetrovsk_.
